userreviews.userReview: Excellent I really enjoyed these books. I read them back to back. You will fall in love with Grace and cheer her on. I highly recommend this series .

description: In this hilarious teen series, Angel in Training Grace Lightbourne is looking for a shortcut to earning her wings. Read the first three full-length novels of this lighthearted series and take off a few bucks at the same time! BOOK 1: WINGING IT! She just wants to fly. Grace skips school to head to Earth for a Mission that seems simple enough, but "seems" doesn't make it so. BOOK 2: GROUNDED! Stuck in Heaven Grace's surprise Mission in NYC gets her out of school and back to Earth, but can she resist the temptations of The Big Apple? BOOK 3: BLOWN AWAY! It's about to get wild. Grace is sent to The Wilds to spy on a group of rebel Angels. It'd be a big job for any Angel, tougher still for an Angel in Training.
title: Take Off!: Super-sized Confessions of an Angel in Training Box Set Books 1-3 (Confessions of an Angel-in-Training)
